attributes.action: resist the temptation to offer the Chinese government or Google any financial help over their spat  over internet censorship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown appears to relish getting the country involved in what is going on in the world by offering bucketsful of taxpayers' money - as in his funding of terrorist training schools in Pakistan - to whichever side takes his fancy, regardless of the rights or wrongs of the situation.  He MUST be taken under control.  Somebody MUST come along and take our cheque book out of his hands!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
